name: Decision Making Reasoning Test 2
description: Practice  Decision Making Reasoning Online Test 2

questions.name: If the set of members of the council who vote against the school bill are the only ones who also vote against the tax bill, then which one of the following statements must be true?

options.name: Arjun votes for the tax bill.
Karn votes for the recreation bill
Karn votes against the school bill.
Bhim votes against the recreation bill

questions.name: Amit Khanna, born on 5th june, 1973 has done his post-graduation in Marketing Management with first class. He has secured 50 % marks in the written Test. He has beenworking in an organization as a Marketing Officer for the last four years.
questions.explanation: All conditions of eligibility are satisfied.

options.name: A. be a graduate with at least 50 % marks.
have secured at least 40 % marks in the written test.
not be less than 24 years and more than 29 years as on 10th October 1997.
should have work experience of at least two years as an officer.

questions.name: Deepak Aggarwal has joined the organization four years back as an Officer.He stays with his wife and two children. Neither he nor his wife owns a house.

options.name: if the employee is to be provided with accommodation
if the employee is not to be provided with accommodation
if the complete information s regards all the above criteria are not provided in the question
if the case is to be referred to the Director, Finance

questions.name: RC Bhargav is a son of an industrialist and from another state who has set his factory in 1990 and has a domicile certificate of the state. He is ready to pay the entire amount in 4 years if required. He does not own a house in Gurgaon city limits but his wife owns a flat in Gurgaon. His date of birth is 11th Nov 1960.

options.name: Do not allot flat
Refer to the Chairman
Refer to the President
Allot flat

questions.name: Rahul is a Science graduate with 65% marks and has completed post-graduation in Finance. He completed 26 years of age in 2016 and has four years’ experience as aSenior Manager. He is ready to join on one-year probation.

options.name: if the candidate is to be selected.
if the data given are not sufficient to take any decision.
if the case is to be referred to the Asst General Manager.
if the case is to be referred to the General Manager.

questions.name: Gaurav Sheth has represented his school and college in Cricket and Chess. He has passed his BSc with Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics at the age of 20 years in 1994.He came 2nd in the merit list in the selection test with 78% marks and has enclosed two recommendations. He has scored 62% and 65% in SSC and BSc, respectively.

options.name: Not to be called the interview
Data inadequate
To be called for interview
Refer to Manager - Administration

questions.name: Manish is a young and dynamic Company Secretary, has got 65% in the exams, he has experience as Company Secretary in ABC Company Limited; he has excellent communication skills in Hindi and English and also in German.

options.name: The candidate be appointed as Company Secretary
The candidate is not to be appointed as Company Secretary.
The case is to be referred to the Managing Director of the company.
The Data provided is ‘in adequate to take decision’.

questions.name: Nitin Narang was born on 25th August, 1975. He has secured 60% and 50% marks in graduation and in the written test, respectively. He has been working in an oorganizationas Officer for the last four years.
questions.explanation: The candidate satisfies condition (6) instead of condition (3).

options.name: be a graduate with at least 50 % marks.
have secured atleast 40 % marks in the written test.
not be less than 24 years and more than 29 years as on 10th October, 1997.
fulfils all other criteria except at (4) above but has a diploma in Marketing Management, his/her case is to be referred to General Manager, Marketing.

questions.name: Geeta joined the organization in 1979 when she was twenty-eight years old as an officer. She is unmarried and stays with her mother in a rented house. She does not own a house.
questions.explanation: All conditions of eligibility are satisfied.

options.name: if the employee is to be provided with accommodation
if the employee is not to be provided with accommodation
if the complete information s regards all the above criteria are not provided in the question
if the case is to be referred to the Director, Finance

questions.name: Mrs. Divya Lahiri, a domicile of the state and a married woman of 36 years, has been running a beauty parlour in the city since 4th March 1992. Her husband is employed in a nearby city but both of them do not own a house in Gurgaon. She can pay the entire amount in 5 years.
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Divya Lahiri does not fulfill the Condition B. It is also not given in the question whether
Mrs. Divya Lahiri is ready to show the ration card for last 5 years. Hence, data is not adequate.

options.name: Allot flat
Data inadequatecorrect
Do not allot flat
Refer to the Chairman
